Class Individual

  • java.lang.Object
    • disease.Individual

  • public class Individual
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.awt.Color color
      color of the dot : susceptible-green , infected-red , recovered-blue

      time step to perform the displacement of individuals

      disease parameters for this individual
      private boolean identified
      TRUE if this individual has been identified as contaminated, FALSE otherwise

      number of days after infection
      private Vector othersForce
      force applied by other individuals on this individual when social distancing is on

      position of this individual

      value of socialDistanceCoeff when this individual applies social distancing

      distance at which individuals repel each other when social distancing is active

      coefficient defining the extent of social distancing for this individual

      "susceptible" OR "infected" OR "recovered"

      maximum speed of this individual

      initial speed of this individual

      maximum x value (right edge of the box)

      private double Y_MIN

    • Constructor Detail

      • Individual

        public Individual(Disease d,
                  double xMax,
                  double yMax,
                  double xMin,
                  double yMin)
        Creates an instance of Individual. By default, its state is "susceptible". Its position and velocity are chosen randomly.
        Parameters:
        d - disease parameters for this individual
        xMax - maximum x value (right edge of the box)
        yMax - maximum y value (lower edge of the box)
        xMin - minimum x value (left edge of the box)
        yMin - minimum y value (upper edge of the box)

    • Method Detail

      • getState

        public java.lang.String getState()
        Gets the state of this individual
        Returns:
        the state of this individual ("susceptible" OR "infected" OR "recovered")

        public boolean isCloseEnoughtoInfect(Individual i)
        Method telling whether an individual belongs or not to this individual's radius of infection
        Parameters:
        i - the individual for which we want to know if it belongs this individual's infection radius
        Returns:
        TRUE if the individual i belongs to this individual's infection radius, FALSE otherwise

      • infect

        public void infect(Individual i)
        Method to decide whether this individual infects another individual belonging to its radius of infection
        Parameters:
        i - the individual that may be infected by this individual

      • initialInfect

        public void initialInfect()
        Method to infect manually this individual (to infect the first individuals to transmit the disease in our simulation)
